title: Simulation/VR-Based Mathematics Education Course to Explore the Effectiveness of Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts and practical application experience in workplace settings
context.additional_context: Customized mathematics education design utilizing VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more math problem-solving strategies tailored to diverse cognitive types by applying UDL principles
Learners can solve math problems linked to real work environments through VR simulations with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can analyze formative assessment data and propose improvement measures to evaluate the effectiveness of UDL-based education

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
